frontMatter.title: üéæüè∏ Game Night Announcement
frontMatter.summary: Join us for our first home match of the new season. Exciting matches await with Navan 'A' vs Skryne starting at 8pm. Come and cheer for our team!

prev.title: Meath Leagues Return with Exciting Matches
prev.summary: The Meath Leagues are back with matches on 16th October 2024. Support our teams as they aim for victory!

next.title: Thursday Badminton Fun!
next.summary: Join us at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night from 9pm to 11pm. Open to all skill levels with courts for team games and open play.
